nodes.text: The Lerall were a group who were in disagreement with the Forta. A treaty was negotiated by Grand Master Yoda of the Jedi Order during the Republic Era, which had some success.
The Lerall were first mentioned in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The spelling of their name was given in the script of the audiobook.
